Package com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.config

Package for incorporating the user's preferences into the app's fields and methods.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Settings
    Class with static constants to configure the app.
    SettingsManager
    SettingsManager catches changes the user makes to the preferences in the App Bar's menu's Settings menu item and updates the corresponding runtime variables in Settings.
    SettingsManager.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListenerWm
    Share preferences callback.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Settings.Keys
    Keys will be used as Strings for SharePreferences.

Package com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.config Description

Package for incorporating the user's preferences into the app's fields and methods. The static Settings object is used to store field values. The SettingsManager is used to synchronize those fields with the stored user preferences (as well as initiating any necessary work) when changes are made to the preferences.
